qas.question: How many Grammies has Kanye won as of 2013?
With which artist does Kanye tie with for reaching the top of the annual Pazz & Jop Critic Poll?
How many times has Kanye placed in the annual Time Magazine people list?
In 2013, West had won how many total Grammy Awards?
What rank did About.com give Kanye "Top 50 Hip-Hop Producers" list?
On what day did MTV name Kanye as the year's Number 1 "Hottest MC in the Game."?
December 17, 2010 was the day Kanye was nominated by MTV for what?
What musician did West tie with for topping the annual Pazz & Jop critic poll 4 times each?

context: As of 2013, West has won a total of <a0_0><a3_0>21<a3_0/><a0_0/> Grammy Awards, making him one of the most awarded artists of all-time. About.com ranked Kanye West No. <a4_0>8<a4_0/> on their "Top 50 Hip-Hop Producers" list. On <a5_0>May 16, 2008<a5_0/>, Kanye West was crowned by MTV as the year's No. 1 "Hottest MC in the Game." On December 17, 2010, Kanye West was voted as the <a6_0>MTV Man of the Year<a6_0/> by MTV. Billboard ranked Kanye West No. 3 on their list of Top 10 Producers of the Decade. West ties with <a1_0><a7_0>Bob Dylan<a7_0/><a1_0/> for having topped the annual Pazz & Jop critic poll the most number of times ever, with four number-one albums each. West has also been included <a2_0>twice<a2_0/> in the Time 100 annual lists of the most influential people in the world as well as being listed in a number of Forbes annual lists.
